title: Comfortable hotel except noise
text:
This hotel is very comfortable with it's beds and the furnitures in the room. Bathroom and rooms are very clean and the personnel is always helpful. Breakfast is mediterranean and it is enaugh. Hotel's location is very good.
We stayed at the additional building and the only thing we were not happy was the music coming from the shops on the street.

title: A must see
text: Perfect ancient site. A must see for all the human beings. You can also see the Athens city with 360 degrees view.

title: Nice view and food
text: Good place with delicious food and good sight of acropolis. Green salad and bread are perfect. Mixed seafood plate was average.
